receive.your_username_info: Give your username to other people so they can send you money.

send.you_have_to_be_online: You have to be online to see this screen
send.you_have_to_be_funded: You have to be funded before you can send money
send.recipient_should_be_name_or_address: Recipient should be either a name from your contact list or Stellar/Bitcoin address.
send.person_not_on_stellar: This person isn't on Stellar yet.
send.destination_tag_info: Recipient requires a destination tag to be specified for the transaction. If you don't know the destination tag, please contact them before doing a transaction.
send.amount_info: Type in the amount to send.
send.amount_must_be_greater_than_0: Amount must be greater than zero.
send.transaction_exceeds_your_balance: This transaction exceeds your balance, you can send a max. of {{maxSpend}} STR.
send.recipient_does_not_allow_stellar: Recipient does not allow STR payments. Are you sure you want to send STR anyway?
send.destination_account_unfunded: Destination account is unfunded; send at least {{xtrDeficiency}} STR to fund it.
send.you_need_minimum_balance_to_send: You need a minimum balance of {{stellars}} Stellars to send.
send.cannot_send: Sorry! Cannot send {{amount}} {{currency}} to {{recipient}}. Please make sure your account has enough funds, and the recipient has enough trust to the currency issuer. If it still doesn't work, try again later.
send.error_retrieving_quote_for_outbound_paym: Error while retrieving quote for outbound payment.
send.calculating_path: Stellar is calculating a path for your payment.
send.destination_does_not_exist_info: The wallet you're trying to send to does not exist.
send.no_path_info: Stellar was unable to find a path between you and the destination account.
send.invalid_transaction_info: The transaction was rejected by the server due to a client issue.
send.error_during_transaction: Sorry, an error occurred while submitting your transaction. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again later.
send.error_during_transaction_info: Please ensure you don't send your payment more than once.
send.transaction_submitted_info: Your account balance will update once the payment has cleared.
send.transaction_partially_valid_info: Your transaction could only be partially applied.
send.transaction_not_submitted_info: We were unable to submit the transaction to the server. Please try again later.
send.transaction_malformed_info: Destination account requires destination tag to be specified when making payments.
send.transaction_failed_info: The particular server you sent the transaction to was too busy to forward or process your transaction at the fee you included in it.
send.destination_account_does_not_exist: The destination account does not exist.
send.destination_account_does_not_exist_too_l: The destination account does not exist. Too little STR sent to create it.
send.no_trust_line_in_currency: You have no trust line in this currency.
send.transaction_failed_to_clear: Your transaction failed to clear, reason: {{reason}}.

rewards.send_first_stellars_receive_in_return: Send your first {{stellars}} - receive {{stellars}} in return.
rewards.nonprofits_recipients_prefix: If you're looking for a recipient, these nonprofits
rewards.nonprofits_recipients_suffix: accept stellars. Just type their name into Send.
rewards.reward_ready_to_be_claimed: Your reward is ready to be claimed!
rewards.you_are_in_the_queue: You're in the queue and should receive your reward soon!
rewards.awards_waiting_to_be_claimed: You have rewards waiting to be claimed!
rewards.almost_there: Almost there - log in with Facebook to get these stellars.
rewards.receiver_first_stellars: Receive your first stellars on us!
rewards.you_should_be_receiving_reward_shortly: ...you should be receiving your reward shortly!
rewards.verify_facebook: Almost there! Verify your Facebook account.
rewards.your_facebook_not_eligible: Your Facebook account is not eligible.
rewards.check_other_ways_to_participate: Please check back for other ways to participate soon.
rewards.spam_detection_facebook: Our spam detection checks say your Facebook account isn't eligible. If you are a legitimate user, we apologize and are improving our detection algorithms. And we will release new ways to grab stellars soon, so please check back.
rewards.sorry_your_facebook_not_eligible: Sorry, your Facebook account isn't eligible.
rewards.facebook_account_already_in_use: This Facebook account is already in use.
rewards.you_are_on_the_waiting_list: You are on the waiting list! You will get your stellars soon.

register.agree_text: By clicking the button, you agree to our Terms.
register.username_length_constraint: Username must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters
register.username_start_end_constraint: Must start and end with a letter or number.
register.registration_error_info: There was an error during registration. Please contact us at {{email}} if the problem persists.
register.first_attempt_walled_save_failed: The first attempt to save your wallet failed.

login.remember_me_warning_text: This saves your password on your local disk, meaning an attacker with access to your files could steal your wallet.
login.username_password_cannot_be_blank: Username or password cannot be blank
login.logout_refreshed: You refreshed the page, which unfortunately means you'll have to sign in again. This is necessary because your password (used to access your account) is kept locally in your browser tab and never sent to our servers.
login.logout_security: For your security, you have been logged out because your browser is idle. Please log back in to continue using Stellar.
login.username_emailed_check_inbox: Your username has been emailed to you; please check your inbox.

password.password_not_strong: The password is not strong enough.

recovery.verify_your_email_to_activate_password_r: Verify your email address to activate your password recovery feature.
recovery.recovery_code_will_be_send_email: Your recovery code will be sent to your email.
recovery.recovery_disabled_for_account: Recovery has been disabled for this account.

facebook.giveaway_limit_reached: Today's giveaway limit has been reached.
facebook.get_on_wait_list: Get on the wait list.
facebook.why_facebook_describe: We are currently using Facebook as a verification method to avoid spam but hope to add other methods soon. We will not post on your Facebook.
facebook.verify_error: Please verify your Facebook account and try again.
